translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

A general upheaval among all the enemy forces, and at various points of the State, indicates the result of a combined plan against the liberty and independence of the continental people, for the sudden appearance of some imperial groups in the places of easiest access, their horrendous atrocities, confirms this truth: sufficient and powerful reason to vigorously develop effective means to thwart their machinations.

Your Lordship Division of the Left, not excluding a single man who can ride a horse, suspending all decrees, regardless of the authority, even those most absolute, because the crisis demands and determines so.

You shall also order the gathering of all the cavalry available, taking down the names of the owners and the number of horses provided, so that when they are returned, the missing ones can be paid for from the national coffers, which the government expects from the activity and patriotism of Your Lordship.

God keep Your Lordship  
Secretariat of War Affairs in Caçapava, December 19, 1839  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Official letter from the Excellent Minister of War dated December 19, received on the 25th of the same month. Circular.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic  
Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police.
